responses.body:
{
  "recipes": [
    {
      "name": "Spaghetti Carbonara",
      "author": "Chef Luigi",
      "image_link": "https://static01.nyt.com/images/2021/02/14/dining/carbonara-horizontal/carbonara-horizontal-master768-v2.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp",
      "recipe": [
        "Boil spaghetti in salted water.",
        "Fry pancetta until crispy.",
        "Mix eggs and Parmesan cheese.",
        "Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.",
        "Serve with black pepper and extra cheese."
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Chicken Curry",
      "author": "Chef Anjali",
      "image_link": "https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgsgMgWa_nhaMb1fhoMhw__rV6LABZNEkgxGMGS3lH3564tv5LzROmr7czFTET2oLWnIQR7yydETnRgiWsfNEp-Ojn-oIvvS5vNeNHo6dC0Gvmf6kXxYPTxUYI2G-JxkCHjEU2ps-Zsesw/w672-h515/Malabar+chicken+curry+11.JPG",
      "recipe": [
        "Marinate chicken with spices.",
        "Fry onions, garlic, and ginger.",
        "Add tomatoes and cook until soft.",
        "Add chicken and simmer until cooked.",
        "Serve with rice and naan."
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Beef Tacos",
      "author": "Chef Carlos",
      "image_link": "https://loveandgoodstuff.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/classic-ground-beef-tacos.jpg",
      "recipe": [
        "Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.",
        "Warm tortillas in a pan.",
        "Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, and cheese.",
        "Top with salsa and sour cream.",
        "Serve with lime wedges."
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Vegetable Stir-Fry",
      "author": "Chef Mei",
      "image_link": "https://images.themodernproper.com/billowy-turkey/production/posts/VegetableStirFry_9.jpg?w=600&q=82&auto=format&fit=crop&dm=1703377301&s=da9a5f34539f904ba0ad0f334d38db2f",
      "recipe": [
        "Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.",
        "Heat oil in a wok.",
        "Stir-fry vegetables until tender-crisp.",
        "Add soy sauce and stir well.",
        "Serve with steamed rice."
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Chocolate Cake",
      "author": "Chef Emma",
      "image_link": "https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/food/ic/food_16x9_1600/recipes/easy_chocolate_cake_31070_16x9.jpg",
      "recipe": [
        "Preheat oven and prepare cake pans.",
        "Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.",
        "Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth.",
        "Pour batter into pans and bake.",
        "Cool and frost with chocolate icing."
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Caesar Salad",
      "author": "Chef Marco",
      "image_link": "https://img.taste.com.au/gx29dUOj/w643-h428-cfill-q90/taste/2016/11/caesar-salad-29418-1.jpeg",
      "recipe": [
        "Chop romaine lettuce.",
        "Prepare Caesar dressing.",
        "Toss lettuce with dressing and croutons.",
        "Top with Parmesan cheese.",
        "Serve immediately."
      ]
    }
  ]
}

headers.value: Content-Type, Origin, Accept, Authorization, Content-Length, X-Requested-With
